title: Divisors VI
text: Find the smallest integer with exactlyNodd divisors, where each divisor is greater or equal to 1 !!!For example for 3 odd divisors, 9 (factors 1, 3, 9) is minimum.InputEach line containN (0 < N < 1014).Â  There are 100 inputs total.OutputOne answer on each line for eachN,Modulo 1000000007.ExampleInput:31024Output:997947700
